    Welcome to moving company

    Full-service moving company

    [vc_empty_space alter_height=”medium” hide_on_mobile=”” css=”.vc_custom_1497355401267{margin-bottom: -0.65rem !important;}”][vc_column_text]It’s no secret that moving can be a stressful task, and our specialists are here to help you with managing your relocation stress. You can count on our movers to guide you through the process, door to door.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space alter_height=”medium” hide_on_mobile=”” css=”.vc_custom_1497355425427{margin-bottom: -1.4rem !important;}”][vc_column_text]

    • A full safety guarantee and vetted furniture movers;
    • Flexible work schedule;
    • All loading and unloading into your specially chosen vehicle;

    [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column icons_position=”left”][vc_empty_space alter_height=”large” hide_on_mobile=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

    Our moving process

    Moving is easy

    Book our service

    We pack your goods

    We move your goods

    We unpack your goods

    [vc_empty_space alter_height=”biggest” hide_on_mobile=”” css=”.vc_custom_1497355575188{margin-top: -1.5rem !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column icons_position=”left”][vc_empty_space alter_height=”large” hide_on_mobile=””][/vc_column][vc_column icons_position=”left” offset=”vc_col-md-6″]
    Customer-centric services

    Our services

    Packing

    We can recommend our packing services as part of a full-service move. We’ll make sure you’re ready to go before your moving day arrives.

    Cleaning

    Our expert staff can make sure that your new home or the one you’re leaving looks spotless and sparkling with our cleaning services.

    Storage

    MoveMe company offers professional warehouse spaces and independence security guard to both residential and commercial movers.

    Insurance

    Our moving company offers a full range of valuation and insurance services to make your move as painless and successful as possible.

    [/vc_column][vc_column icons_position=”left” offset=”vc_col-md-offset-1 vc_col-md-5″]
